heading: Today
text: Morning sun giving way to increasing clouds.
temperature: Upper teens to low 20s north, 20s south

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Cloudy. Some light snow north, a few snow showers south.

heading: Wednesday
text: Snow likley, some valley rain south and Champlain Valley

heading: Thursday
text: Scattered snow showers north and mountains, a little sun in southern valleys.
